name: Housing Preservation/ Eviction Defense
description: Each year, Legal Assistance to the Elderly helps hundreds of San Francisco seniors and people with disabilities stay in their homes and avoid losing their housing. Whether you’re struggling to pay rent, facing an illegal rent increase, or dealing with threats related to your immigration status, we’re here to help. If you’ve received a 3-day eviction notice, immediate action is critical. Our dedicated attorneys will fight to protect your rights while our social workers connect you with essential
